channel.title: Adding Npc's
channel.description:
Hey. Now i'm having some problems adding some npc's. I already have knowledge of coding (just so you know)
Now my problem is that when i put the NPC into the Autospawn.cfg then compile it comes up with errors, I havn't added anything else. Is there anything else i need to put in anywere to make the Npc's work
any help will be greatly appreciated tawr

item.title: Adding Npc's
item.dc:creator: @the_predi the predi
item.description:
@the_predi wrote:

do what zubmage is telling he is right and if u want that your npc are walking u let the heigt on a 0 and put after rangex and rangey the coords of the place where they can walk

sry for my bad english

hope u are helped

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Npc's
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

[quote=“goodboi1112, post:8, topic:195071”]ok this is what you do
spawn =npcidTABxTAByTAB0TAB0TAB0TAB0TAB0TAB1TABname of npc[/quote]

You are the biggest idiot I’ve ever seen.
Its: spawn = NPCID XCOORD YCOORD HEIGHT RANGEX RANGEY RANGEX RANGEY WALKTYPE

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Npc's
item.dc:creator: @goodboi1112 goodboi1112
item.description:
@goodboi1112 wrote:

ok this is what you do
spawn =npcidTABxTAByTAB0TAB0TAB0TAB0TAB0TAB1TABname of npc

Read full topic
